questionTitle: After a <u><font color='red'>carefully</font></u> investigation, we <u><font color='red'>soon discovered</font></u> that the house <u><font color='red'>was</font></u> <u><font color='red'>infested with</font></u> termites.

Water insects <u><font color='red'>have</font></u> multitudes of little branching tubes within <u><font color='red'>them</font></u> bodies <u><font color='red'>which</font></u> <u><font color='red'>are</font></u> always full of air.

State university <u><font color='red'>bears</font></u> the name of <u><font color='red'>their</font></u> state, and <u><font color='red'>its</font></u> achievements <u><font color='red'>are</font></u> recognized as state achievements.

It was Vitus Bering, <u><font color='red'>the Danish sea captain</font></u>, <u><font color='red'>who</font></u> discovered Alaska on <u><font color='red'>its</font></u> voyage <u><font color='red'>to</font></u> Russia in 1741.

The color of the Red Sea is due to <u><font color='red'>a minute alga</font></u>, or <u><font color='red'>sea plant</font></u>, <u><font color='red'>whose</font></u> <u><font color='red'>forms</font></u> a huge patch of blood red tint.
